DOC.brief_summary: The aim split mouth study compare method well reduce bone loss heal time follow implant . Specifically , two method investigate immediate gradual load early loading protocol . Research Hypothesis Immediate gradual loading use gingival former superior early loading protocol improve bone quality thus reduce heal time .
DOC.brief_title: Comparing Secondary Stability Dental Implants : Immediate Gradual Loading Versus Early Loading Protocol Posterior Maxilla
DOC.detailed_description: These two method ( gradual load early loading ) use implant patient aim compare protocol lead well outcome patient . A 'better outcome ' defined method , lead least crestal bone loss , fast healing time . Immediate gradually load side : include transmucosal heal dental implant use gingival former replace every 2 week consequent large size gingival former.i.e . surgery time implant receive 2 mm height gingival former swap 3 mm , 4 mm , 5 mm last 6 mm early loaded side : implant submerge surgery time till load time ( 2 month ) .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion 1 . Patients bilateral Partial complete edentulous area maxillary premolar/molar region . 2 . Free medical history . 3 . Enough bone quantity . 4 . Enough keratinize mucosa Exclusion criterion 1 . Systemic disease . 2 . Irradiated bone ( radiotherapy ) . 3 . Heavy smoke habit . 4 . Patients undergoing longterm immunosuppressive therapy . 5 . Atrophic ridge . 6 . Presence local bony lesion . 7 . Presence mandibular parafunctional habit
